headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Targa Resources (TRGP) Dividend Hike Plan And Oakmark’s Endorsement
summary: Targa Resources Corp. recently declared a quarterly cash dividend of US$1.00 per common share for the fourth quarter of 2025, payable on February 13, 2026, to shareholders of record as of January 30, 2026, and indicated plans to recommend lifting the payout to US$1.25 per share for the first quarter of 2026, subject to board approval. At the same time, Oakmark Select Fund highlighted Targa’s fee-based, contract-driven earnings and dominant Mont Belvieu fractionation position, underscoring...
